meta.title: Citinewsroom: Ghana News, Business, Sports, Showbiz, Facts, Opinions

meta.name: description
meta.content: Breaking news, business, sports, TV, radio and a whole lot more. Citinewsroom.com informs, educates and entertains. Comprehensive news analysis from Ghana.
Citinewsroom: Ghana News, Business, Sports, Showbiz, Facts, Opinions
Citinewsroom.com is Ghana's most comprehensive news website. Citinewsroom delivers high-quality innovative and alternative news content that challenges the status quo.

h3.a: Northerners support for Bawumia is about competence, not ethnicity Nitiwul

div.p: The Member of Parliament for Bimbilla and former Minister for Defence, Dominic Nitiwul, has dismissed claims that support for Dr Mahamudu Bawumia in Northern Ghana is driven by shared ethnicity,
